title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint and then cancelling the operation, the breakpoint is still added and takes effect during debugging.
EB: If the operation to add an exception breakpoint is cancelled, the breakpoint should not be added and should not have any effect during debugging.
SR: To reproduce: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
